section_title: Amount of the limit on government assistance
section_text: 1 1 Section 15 of the Commonwealth Development Corporation Act 1999 (limit on government assistance) is amended as follows. 2 In subsection (1), for  “£1,500 million” substitute  “                £6,000 million              ” . 3 After subsection (3) insert— 4 The Secretary of State may by regulations substitute for the amount for the time being specified in subsection (1) a larger amount not exceeding £12,000 million. 5 Regulations made by the Secretary of State under this section are to be made by statutory instrument. 6 A statutory instrument containing regulations under this section may not be made unless a draft of the instrument has been laid before and approved by a resolution of the House of Commons.
2 1 This Act may be cited as the Commonwealth Development Corporation Act 2017. 2 This Act extends to the whole of the United Kingdom. 3 This Act comes into force on the day on which it is passed.
